description: Fast 35mm wide-angle lens. With a minimum focusing distance of only 0.8 ft. (25cm), you can approach the subject closer and still obtain a more natural wide-angle effect. You can even obtain good background blur for portraits.An affordable lens thatís ideal for tasks like group photos and other applications calling for excellent optical performance and moderately wide focal length. Itís compact and lightweight, and with f/2.0 speed, itís a compelling alternative to a wide-angle zoom lens for low-light shooting.Wide and FastIf you need an ultra-wide angle and a large aperture, one of the following lenses will fit the bill. Ultra-wide-angle lenses can capture scenes beyond your natural field of vision. The EF 15mm f/2.8 Fisheye, the widest of them all, has a 180∞ angle of view. For more normal-looking wide-angle shots, there are longer wide-angle lenses up to 35mm with the maximum aperture you need.
title: Canon EF 35mm f/2 Wide Angle Lens for Canon SLR Cameras
